text_block_list.name: Umamusume Foodie
text_block_list.text:
The dessert buffet yesterday was so<n>yummy! I'm
supercharged with energy! ♪

text_block_list.name: Shy Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
U-um... is Bourbon looking at us? Do you<n>think
she's mad? Were we too loud?

text_block_list.name: Shy Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! Did you feel that bass?! Is this the<n>error
sound that plays whenever<n>Bourbon gets angry?!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Foodie
text_block_list.text:
Eeep! We're sorry! We were being too<n>rowdy!
We'll go for a run to burn off this<n>energy!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
No, I want you to tell me about this<n>method of
energy rechar—

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...They're gone. Beginning analysis of the<n>
situation.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Misunderstandings regarding my facial<n>expression
and abdominal sounds<n>caused subjects to flee.
High crowd<n>density will make pursuit... difficult.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I conclude that communication remains<n>the most
difficult operation for me to<n>execute...
